Create with
Task Priority Time Editing with
{{item.description}} {{item.time}} {{item.time}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { LocalService } from '../local.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { constructor (private localStore: LocalService, private route : ActivatedRoute, private router : Router) {} login : string = ''; logged : boolean = true; // then change to false and repair token tasks = [ {description: 'Погулять с собакой', priority: '', time: ''}, {description: 'Дописать функционал', priority: '', time: ''}, {description: 'Выпить воды', priority: '', time: ''}, {description: 'Выучить как отцентровать div', priority: '', time: ''} ]; options = [ 'Важно', 'Важно но лень', 'Не важно' ]; ngOnInit () { // taking params from URL query; mosty from log and sign pages via RouterChange this.route.queryParamMap.subscribe(params => { this.login = params.get('UserLogin') || ''; if (this.login != '') { this.logged = true; } } ); } createModal() : void { } createReactive() : void { } changeModal(item : {}, i : number) : void { } changeReactive(item : {}, i : number) : void { } }
